thread.title: Andi Murphjy

author: Andi Murphjy
title: Andi Murphjy
text:
Fast, efficient, great value and very polite and friendly guys.
They arrived on time on time and it was so much easier than than sitting in a cold dirty tyre shop waiting room with staff that just nod and grunt at you.
To be perfectly honest, when I think about my previous experience driving into tyre centers, you arrive at the time they say, wait about for about 20 minutes while they sneak in a quick job then it almost feels like you are inconveniencing the staff by being there !
Definitely recommend this service on all counts
